# content

**Instance Property**

The content associated with the notification.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var content: UNNotificationContent { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to access the contents of the notification.

## Getting the Request Details

- **identifier**: The unique identifier for this notification request.
- **trigger**: The conditions that trigger the delivery of the notification.
